sub_title: Accountant, Master in Business Administration MBA
summary:
Experience of more than ten years leading teams in accounting, administrative and financial processes in small and medium Colombian companies, with skills to coordinate internal and external audit work. High capacity for analysis and advice, achieving improvements in the overall performance and productivity of the accounting and financial area through action plans and periodic recommendations based on the analysis of financial information and learning from mistakes.

Consolidated knowledge in administrative and accounting processes in the health sector, working in Public Plan and Private health care companies for more than 10 years in different administrative and financial areas. 

Advising in business and financial management to entrepreneurs, startups, small and medium enterprises in different economic sectors: health care, commercial, construction, technology, entertainment,non profit organizations. 

n all the roles I have held in my professional career, I have demonstrated a high degree of professionalism,a strong work ethic, and a commitment to improving my training, teamwork, and communication skills.

EXPERTISE
-Research and descriptive analysis skills to help organizations identify opportunities and improvements in achieving their objectives.
-Involved in advising companies to anticipate the information needs of relevant stakeholders on the one hand and aproach changing legislation and Colombian's regulations on the other.
-Determine how companies can optimally organize their financial function.
-Advise and support companies with regard to optimizing financial and administrative processes.
-Strong analytical skills and able to make connections in an multidisciplinary team.
-Review and test internal control, in order to provide support in rationalizing or improving the control framework.
-Advisory role to help clients move forward and make a real impact.
-Provide business recommendations in line with shareholder and management goals.
